{{Infobox person | name = Manjot Singh | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birthname = Manjot Singh | birth_date = july 7, 1992 | birth_place = [[India]], [[Delhi]] | occupation = [[Actor]] | yearsactive = 2008-present | spouse = bachelor | website =

'''Manjot Singh''' is a Indian Bollywood actor, most famous for his role in the film ''[[Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!]]'' as the young Lucky.
==Childhood== Manjot Singh was born in a [[Sikh]] family. His father is a doctor and mother is in government service.
==Debut==
Manjotâs father came to know that [[Paramjot Singh]] and his team were in [[Delhi]] scouting for actors and asked his son if he wanted to try it out. They went to [[Arvinder]] for an audition though Manjot had never acted before, even in school plays. After the audition the casting director of [[Dibakar Banerjee]]âs [[Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!]] rejected Manjot Singh for the role of the boy who grows up to be master thief Lucky. However [[Dibakar Banerjee]] knew he had found his Lucky. âEven though the casting director wasnât convinced, I just put my foot down,â the director said.<ref name=ind>[http://www.indianexpress.com/news/oye-lucky/426655/2 Oye Lucky] [[Indian Express]], 22 February 2009.</ref> After being selected, Manjot went to [[Manali, Himachal Pradesh|Manali]] for a week long acting workshop. He was asked to observe the way [[Abhay Deol]] walked, smiled and talked so that he could imitate that in his acting. He even wore a cheek pad so that his jaw would look as broad as [[Abhay Deol]]âs.<ref name=ind/>
<!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Manjot-receiving-filmfare-award.jpg|thumb|200px|Manjot Singh receiving his Filmfare award in 2009]] -->
==Filmography== **2008- ''[[Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!]]'' **2010- ''[[Udaan (2010 film)|Udaan]]''
==Award== * 2009: [[Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor]]: ''[[Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!]]''
==Television== **2010- [[Fear Factor - Khatron Ke Khiladi Level 3]]
==Critics on Manjot in his debut==
* '''Planet Bollywood''': "Young Lucky (played marvellously by Manjot Singh)..." <ref>http://planetbollywood.com/displayReview.php?id=f121408091055</ref>
* '''[[Rediff.com]]''': "...young Lucky (brilliantly played by Manjot Singh)..."<ref>http://www.rediff.com/movies/2008/nov/28go-for-oye-lucky-lucky-aye.htm</ref>
* '''Reviewer Noyon Jyoti Parasara''': "...Special mention is deserved by Manjot Singh, who plays the younger Lucky." <ref>http://www.aol.in/bollywood-story/oye-lucky-lucky-oye-movie-review/2008112801009019000001</ref>
* '''Khalid Mohammad''': "And thereâs Lucky, as a callow teenager (excellently played by Manjot Singh)..." <ref>http://www.hindustantimes.com/StoryPage/StoryPage.aspx?sectionName=HomePage&id=049abf1b-358b-4bf8-a968-dca5c8b41d02&&Headline=STRONGReview/STRONG:+EMOye+Lucky!+Lucky+Oye!/EM/</ref>
